channel.title: Re: omfg -.-''
channel.description:
ok i recently edited a edited evolutionX and oceanX i had it all running fine people connecting yada yada well i had 2 get a new pc today so i sent the files to my email dled ported ect.. made sure no ip changed and now... when i login to the client if i walk i dc... but everyone else connecting works perfectly... im hosting it all ips ect.. are changed to what thier supposed 2 be can anyone tell me what the issue is:? why i walk andthen i dc but if i stand still im fine...
OS windows 7 home perm <<< fail. computer : laptop yes all javas r dled jdk6 20 and both 32 an 64 bit javas... idk windows 7 uses 2 javas iz wierd... but if u could help pl0x would rep++ ^^

item.title: Re: omfg -.-''
item.dc:creator: @geel9 geel9
item.description:
@geel9 wrote:

Czar y2k:

try making your run.bat a .exe; download a .bat to .exe convertor, and then it should work.

What the hell? That wouldn’t do anything. It’s the EXACT same code.

Read full topic
